unnormalised: Arey yaar, cart abandonment? Happens to the best of us! Maybe Priya forgot her UPI pin again? Or perhaps Ramesh got distracted by a cricket match on 10/11/2024 at 3 PM? We've all been there, done that. My cart's looking like a ghost town too since 26/01/1950! Rs. 500 delivery charge? Hai Ram! Maybe next time, huh? Check again at 10:00 hrs.
normalised: Arey yaar, cart abandonment? Happens to the best of us! Maybe Priya forgot her U P I pin again? Or perhaps Ramesh got distracted by a cricket match on tenth november two thousand and twenty four at three P M? We've all been there, done that.
